comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
1. A file search on Java files containing some text (for example author name)
2. Opening the Java Editor from the Search View using CTRL+. then F12 then editing a bit (removing some varying lines), then closing with CTRL+W and saving, and proceeding with CTRL+.
3. After doing so a couple of times (I edited a about 100 files), the error occurs (the editor is opened with an exception)
